title: Petro Ruci Stadium
text: Petro Ruci Stadium is a multi-use <a href="stadium">stadium</a> in <a href="Orikum">Orikum</a>, <a href="Albania">Albania</a>. The stadium has a capacity of 2,000 people and it is mostly used for <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> matches and it is the home ground of <a href="KF%20Oriku">KF Oriku</a>.
